sentences.english: The results provided the scientific theory basis for slope erosion control in the Hilly-gully region of Loess Plateau.

definition: growing as a thicket/overgrown/breaking out everywhere (of disease, social disorder etc)
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
large inscribed stele/fig. great achievement/imperishable masterpiece

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to vanish gradually/to disappear/to fade out

topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
